data.title: Brnica Group
data.meta_description:
Brnica Group - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The document summarizes investigations into the Brnjica cultural group in the South Morava basin in Serbia. It discusses the group's origins, development, chronology and sites based on past studies. Key points include:
- The group dates from the 14th-11th centuries BC based on findings at various sites. 
- It likely emerged from interaction between local Bronze Age populations and newcomers influenced by Greek and urnfield cultures.
- Sites exhibiting the group have been found throughout the South Morava valley and include settlements, fortifications and necropolises.
